# Request for Information: Client Case Relationship Management Solution

**Tender ID:** WS4585755327-Doc4587658938
**Amendment Number:** 11

**Publication Date:** 2024-05-21
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-24T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2024-07-15

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking industry feedback and input regarding the development of a new Client Case Relationship Management (CCRM) solution for the Government of Canada (GC). This Request for Information (RFI) aims to gather information and identify potential solutions to address the government's needs and requirements.

## Background

The PSPC is responsible for managing the HR and Pay applications landscape, including the Case Management Tool (CMT). The RFI seeks to:

* Engage with industry stakeholders to provide initial context and better understand their needs and available solutions.
* Alert the market and obtain feedback on PSPC's intent to reimagine the user experience for HR and Pay applications.
* Identify potential solutions to address the government's requirements.

## Notice Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:** Martyniuk, David (SPAC/PSPC) - david.martyniuk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19738588?extsite=MTk3Mzg1ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Tender Description:**

The Response File and statement of Requirements (SOR) has been revised. Please disregard the Ariba discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2024-07-24 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

## UNSPSC Classification

* **81111500:** Software or hardware engineering

## Trade Agreements

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
